name: Comparably, Inc.
description: Provider of employee compensation and workplace culture review platform created to access and compare employee company culture data to industry benchmarks. The company's platform provides compensation and culture data based on gender, years of experience, region and company size, to assess employees values and needs as well as information about startup salaries based on how much venture capital has been raised enabling companies easily see how they stack up against their competitors.
one_liner: Provider of employee compensation and workplace culture review platform created to access and compare employee company culture data to industry benchmarks.
